Handles configuring Cisco routers for circuit set up, teardown, and status checking.

Provides functionality for circuit set up, teardown, and status checking using Cisco routers. Router configuration templates in text format contain placeholders for the parameters to be used in the specific circuit operation. This package fills in these parameters for a specific instance, clogin's into a particular router, and writes the instance to the router. An LSP is set up or torn down, or has its status checked as a result.
